name: Surrounded
description:
After the local science factory that researched "black matter" & "dark energy" exploded, the whole forest with the small village went dark & all of the living creatures within a 20 miles radius got affected and has never been the same since. The government tried to replace the place, but all of the agents sent in lost their radio signal and never came back. As the place now has been abandoned for 30 years, you and a brave group of friends decided that enough is enough and want to check out the place itself. Surely cannot be that bad, or can it?

You and your friend group quickly discover that you are surrounded by something, but by what? Let's find out.

Surrounded's Features


Immserive & Atmospheric Experience
➢ Hyper-realistic graphics & sounds rendered in URP, as well as having as little hud shown as possible create a new atmospheric feel and a totally immersive experience.

Enemy AI's react to sound
➢ While investigating the creepy forest, be aware to not make enough noise to get yourself attacked.

Huge open world map
➢ Our first mission, "the forest" has an entire open-world map, with different buildings such as an abandoned hospital, houses, etc which are ready to get explored and looted.

Alternative endings
➢ There are several endings that you could encounter, it truly depends on how you figure out (or if you figure out) to life the curse of the deep woods.

AND A LOT MORE
